analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xac20d4faf98f1eaecb6b1e631f23881c71960e61.sol#10-11)
SERENITY.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xac20d4faf98f1eaecb6b1e631f23881c71960e61.sol#65)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xac20d4faf98f1eaecb6b1e631f23881c71960e61.sol:
